column1: Little Goat Diner////We arrived at 7PM on a Wednesday and miraculously did not have to wait for a table. We were immediately taken by the charming ambiance and interior design of the restaurant. After extensive deliberation
column2: we ordered the goat chili cheese fries
column4: and pork belly pancake. The food was delicious and the Asian food elements satisfied my Asian food cravings in the best diner-style way. The dishes were all very well rounded and blended the different savory
